product_name: The North Face DNP Vest - Women's
long_description: Super lightweight and very warm, the women's DNP Vest from The North Face aces alpine adventures with PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation and innovative hybrid construction. 60g PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation, quilted in the core, delivers a high warmth-to-weight ratio, dries quickly and insulates even when wet. Side and underarm panels are made of a lightweight, stretchy soft-shell fabric that breathes well as you work hard, increases mobility and reduces bulk. Ripstop nylon shell fabric features a durable water repellent finish to shed light moisture. The North Face DNP Vest for women features an adjustable hem and zippered hand pockets. Zippered hand pocket doubles as a compressible stow pouch. This vest is part of The North Face Summit Series(TM), apparel designed and tested for use in harsh environments.
short_description: Super lightweight and very warm, the women's DNP Vest from The North Face aces alpine adventures with PrimaLoft(R) One(R) insulation and innovative hybrid construction.
